articles.author: Hugh Son
articles.title: How thousands of Americans got caught in fintech’s false promise and lost access to bank accounts - CNBC
articles.description: The Synapse collapse has revealed fintech's promise of safety as a mirage. More than 100,000 Americans with $265 million in deposits were locked from accounts.
articles.content:
Natasha Craft, a 25-year-old FedEx driver from Mishawaka, Indiana. She has been locked out of her Yotta banking account since May 11.

articles.title: ‘American Idol’ judge Luke Bryan shares which stars have been ‘in the talks’ to replace Katy Perry on hit show - Fox News
articles.description: Luke Bryan shared who is in talks to replace Katy Perry as a judge on the next season of "American Idol." Perry left the show after seven seasons.
articles.content:
Luke Bryan is preparing himself for whoever ends up in the judge's chair that Katy Perry left empty.
